channel.title: Need help with source!
channel.description:
would be very nice if someone could help me with the next requests..
Full working Pest control working warriors guild (cyclops dropping defenders) Full working Recipe for disaster quest. Add a item Chest for gloves. A Pk shop and items buyable only with PK points. Full godwars Full slayer skill. 573 HP Bar Infinity buys > shop Remove fightpits Fight caves > wave 30 - 63 Correct GFX emotes for Npc's
thank you, if you like to help me Please post below your skypename so i can add you :)

item.title: Need help with source!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I don’t think you understand this section, so please read carefully and then feel free to create another topic as appropriate.

This section is for users to come to if they have any errors that need to be sorted, are having any difficulties understanding something or for users to come to in order to help other users. It is not for requesting code so you may complete a quest. We are not a spoon feeding community, but we are a helping one.

Start the features you’re having difficulty with yourself, and if you have any problem with code then come here and we can assist you further. Also, check out the downloads section and see if there are any sources with all of the features, to save you time.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with source!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

It isn’t our job to do your work for you. Why don’t you google at least half of those, as I know there are tutorials for them.

mr extremez:

This is the help section, not the request section lol. On top of that i dont even think there is a reqest section on mopar.

the only request-based section we have is “Download requests”, which this doesn’t fall under.

Read full topic
